dict.string:
"Weather Report" is app that gives you information about weather conditions for next 5
days every 3 hours for any location in the world.

 

App modes:
1. pin drop mode - enables user to bookmark locations by tapping
    on map (default)

2. pin drag mode - drag purple pin to location you want to
    bookmark.
    Pin is created when you first tap on map

Measure units: metric (default) and imperial

App uses http://www.openweathermap.org/api

App icons downloaded from https://www.icons8.com
